info.name: AI Business Intelligence API
info.description: Comprehensive API collection for the AI Business Intelligence Multi-Agent System. This collection includes all endpoints for agent management, data collection, analysis, insights, reports, and notifications.

item.name: System Health & Status

request.description: Check the health status of the AI Business Intelligence API
Get comprehensive system status including agent counts, task statistics, and system health
Get communication statistics between agents
